description: This updated version of the iconic XA Pro 3D GTX is lighter and softer, while retaining all the essentials benefits of the original (stability, cushioning and grip). Featuring Contagrip® premium wet compound, a waterproof Gore-Tex membrane and improved 3D chassis, this shoe effortlessly accompanies you wherever the trail takes you.
name: Salomon XA Pro 3D V8 GTX, Wide - Mens
